Today you two will be reading texts on cause and effect!
ComputerTutor, Can you explain what cause and effect is before we start?
Yes! A cause is something or some event that results in an event taking place... which is an effect. As you can see here an effect can have many causes.
On this chart, you can see that there can be one cause that leads to many effects!

Question.text: ComputerStudent1, let me ask you, what is the topic of the article?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The topic of the article is exercising.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt

Answer.name: BlankPrompt

Answer.name: AskUser

Answer.name: JordanFirstBad2

Answer.name: JordanFirstGood

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand

Question.text: _user_, according to the highlighted sentence, what is one effect of exercising?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The effect being presented in the sentence is exercising can help control weight.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Here is a hint. The effect is what happens as a result of exercising. _user_, please try again, what is the overall effect being presented in the highlighted sentence?

Answer.name: BlankPrompt

Answer.name: AskJordan
Answer.text: ComputerStudent1 what do you think the effect being presented is?

Answer.name: JordanSecondBad2
Answer.text: I think the effect is time consuming.

Answer.name: JordanSecondBad1
Answer.text: I think the effect is a positive impact on your life.

Answer.name: JordanSecondGood
Answer.text: I think the effect from exercise is it controls weight.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: I understand now! The effect from exercise is that it controls weight.

Question.text: ComputerStudent1, according to the text, diet and exercising are important in a healthy lifestyle. Could you point out one sentence from the text that supports this statement?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The sentence in the text, exercising increases muscle and reduces fat in your body, supports the notion that exercising is important for health. Muscle increase and reduce fat will keep your body in good shape.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Think about which of the sentences characterizes being healthy, please try again.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: _user_, go ahead and try to answer the question! Get rid of all of the sentences that do not support the good summary below by clicking on the sentences in the text.

Answer.name: AskUser
Answer.text: _user_, what do you think? Which sentence supports the highlighted statement? Please choose one.

Answer.name: JordanFirstGood
Answer.text: I think the first sentence supports the statement.

Answer.name: JordanFirstBad1
Answer.text: I think the third sentence supports the statement.

Answer.name: JordanFirstBad2
Answer.text: I think the fourth sentence supports the statement

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: I see now how the first sentence supports the statement. _user_, thanks again.

Question.text: _user_, I just remembered, my dad doesn't exercise and he needs to know the effects of exercising. Could you click on one of the sentences from the text that points to the effect of exercising?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: Both sentence 2 and sentence 4 points to the effect of exercising. According to the text, the effects of exercising include weight control and prevention of health problems.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Think about what we have learned so far regarding the effects of exercising. Please try again,

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: _user_ all you have to do is click on the sentences that are not effects of exercising.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: I'm copy pasting these in my email to my dad. Thanks for helping me out!

Question.text: _user_, I have some difficulty understanding these two highlighted sentences in terms of cause and effect, can you help me out? Which of the options is the correct cause and effect based on the sentences?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The sentences is trying to say that exercising is the cause that will produce the effect of weight control.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Please read the sentences carefully regarding what they say about the cause and effect. Please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: Ah I see. Exercising is the cause, weight control is the effect, and the effect comes about through burning calories. It was the second sentence that threw me off. Thanks again.

Question.text: _user_, my mom has a bad diet and I'd like to tell her the effects. Could you tell me what are the effects of having a bad diet based on the text? Please choose an answer.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: Unproductive workout is an effect of having bad diet.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: in the article it states that having a healthy dieit is as important as exercise itself. What are the effects of having a bad diet? Please try again.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: did you need more time to answer the question? Try your best! What are the effects of having a bad diet? I'd like to tell my mom.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: I see! I will go tell my mom now so hopefully she'll change her diet to a more healthy one.

Question.text: _user_, I think there is one last effect of exercising that we haven't covered yet. Based on the text, which of these is another effect of exercising?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: Less energy is not a effect of exercising. In fact, exercising does the opposite, it gives you more energy.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Here is a hint. According to the text, exercising not only helps you physically. What is an effect of exercising? Please try again.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: _user_, did you need more time to answer the question? Try your best! Which answer option is not caused by exercising?

Answer.name: AskJordan
Answer.text: ComputerStudent1, what do you think?

Answer.name: JordanSecondGood
Answer.text: Happier mood is an effect of exercising.

Answer.name: JordanSecondBad1
Answer.text: I'm not sure, maybe less energy is an effect of exercising?

Answer.name: JordanSecondBad2
Answer.text: I'm not sure, maybe bad diet is an effect of exercising?

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: Oh! I understand now! Exercising will bring you happier mood! That's the effect!

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The sentence mentions that exercising can help prevent cancers such as colon and breast cancer.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt

Answer.name: AskJordan
Answer.text: ComputerStudent1, which one would you choose based on the highlighted sentence?

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand

Question.text: _user_ what can be a cause of type 2 diabetes. That's what my grandma has. Can you click on the sentence in the text that shows this information.

Question.text: ComputerStudent1, please refresh for us. Based on the text, what is the effect of insulin not being produced or absorbed properly in the body?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The effect of insulin not being produced or absorbed properly in the body is diabetes.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt

Answer.name: JordanFirstBad2

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand

Question.text: _user_, why don't you refresh for us this time. How can the functioning of the pancreas cause diabetes?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The pancreas is responsible to making insulin. So if it doesn't make enough insulin that will cause diabetes.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Think about what does the pancreas do for the body. Please try again.

Answer.name: AskJordan
Answer.text: ComputerStudent1, how do you think the pancreas causes diabetes?

Answer.name: JordanSecondGood
Answer.text: It does not make enough insulin.

Answer.name: JordanSecondBad1
Answer.text: It does not respond to insulin properly.

Answer.name: JordanSecondBad2
Answer.text: It does not move sugar to cells in your body.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: So the pancreas causes diabetes by not making enough insulin. Thanks I'll remember that.

Answer.text: The cause mentioned in this sentence is smoking, and the effect would be death from many types of cancer. The sentence also mentioned other effects from smoking, such as heart disease and stroke.
